mapper.select: select a.pb_no pb_no, pb_type, pb_title, m_name, to_char(pb_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as pb_date from personal_board a inner join member b on a.m_num = b.m_num order by pb_no desc
mapper.insert:
select personal_board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into personal_board(pb_no, pb_type, pb_title, pb_pwd, board_no, m_num, pb_content, pb_date, pb_img1) VALUES(#{pb_no},#{pb_type},#{pb_title},#{pb_pwd},#{board_no},#{m_num},#{pb_content},#{pb_date}, #{pb_img1} )
mapper.select: select nvl((select 1 from personal_board where pb_no=#{pb_no} and pb_pwd=#{pb_pwd}),0) as state from dual
